name: XamarinAndroid
description: Build an Android app with Xamarin
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: project
inputs.label: Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from repo root of Xamarin.Android project(s) to build.  Wildcards can be used.  For example, `**/*.csproj` for all csproj files in all subfolders.  The project must have a PackageForAndroid target if `Create App Package` is selected.

inputs.name: target
inputs.label: Target
inputs.helpMarkDown: Build these targets in this project. Use a semicolon to separate multiple targets.

inputs.name: outputDir
inputs.label: Output Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally provide the output directory for the build. Example: $(build.binariesDirectory)/bin/Release.

inputs.name: createAppPackage
inputs.label: Create App Package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Passes the target (/t:PackageForAndroid) during build to generate an APK.

inputs.name: clean
inputs.label: Clean
inputs.helpMarkDown: Passes the clean target (/t:clean) during build.

inputs.name: msbuildVersion
inputs.label: MSBuild Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: If the preferred version cannot be found, the latest version found will be used instead. On a Mac xbuild (Mono) will be used.

inputs.name: msbuildLocation
inputs.label: MSBuild Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally supply the path to MSBuild (on Windows) or xbuild (on Mac).

inputs.name: msbuildArchitecture
inputs.label: MSBuild Architecture
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally supply the architecture (x86, x64) of MSBuild to run.

inputs.name: msbuildArguments
inputs.label: Additional Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional arguments passed to MSBuild (on Windows) or xbuild (on Mac).

inputs.name: jdkSelection
inputs.label: Select JDK to use for the build
inputs.helpMarkDown: Pick the JDK to be used during the build by selecting a JDK version that will be discovered during builds or by manually entering a JDK path.

inputs.name: jdkVersion
inputs.label: JDK Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use the selected JDK version during build.

inputs.name: jdkUserInputPath
inputs.label: JDK Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use the JDK version at specified path during build.

inputs.name: jdkArchitecture
inputs.label: JDK Architecture
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally supply the architecture (x86, x64) of JDK.
